sentence.Network_en: He was the sole proprietor with total management control.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是唯一业主，掌握全部管理权。

sentence.Network_en: The proprietor was an old acquaint-ance of his.
sentence.Network_cn: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

sentence.Network_en: He is now sole proprietor of the business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在一个人拥有这家公司.

entry.def: The proprietor of a hotel, shop, newspaper, or other business is the person who owns it.

example.ex: He was the sole proprietor with total management control.
example.tran: 他是唯一业主，掌握全部管理权。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) someone who owns (is legal possessor of) a business;

sentences.sentence: "he is the owner of a chain of restaurants"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =one's/own,表示"拥有"; 2. 引申为恰当的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+propri恰当的+ate……的→adj.适当的,恰当的,特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 所有的, 私人拥有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proprietor[n.所有者]+y……的,……人等→adj.所有的, 私人拥有的 n.所有者, 所有权
proprietor[n.所有者]+y……的,……人等→adj.所有的, 私人拥有的 n.所有者, 所有权
propri适当的+ety表名词→n.礼节,适当
ex出+propri拥有+at表动词→不再拥有→没收

sentences.en: He is now sole proprietor of the business.
sentences.cn: 他现在一个人拥有这家公司。
